page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content: {THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND ALL SAINTS} MEETING WITH REVEREND CASE.CHRISTIANITY.REVEREND CASE IS NOW RETIRED AND IS JUST TAKING SERVICES UNTIL A NEW VICAR ARRIVES.WE SPENT AN HOUR IN THE CHURCH TALKING ABOUT THE CHURCH TODAY. {PURPOSE}TO REFLECT GODS GLORY AND LIGHT THROUGH THE LOVE OF JESUS. TO SPREAD THE GOOD NEWS TO THE WORLD. THE CHURCH IS THE FAMILY OF GOD.WINKLEIGH CHURCH IS IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE.THE CLOCK TELLS THE TIME ALL OVER THE VILLAGE.THE SERVICE TIMES ARE 10.15 ON THURSDAYS AND 9.30 ON SUNDAYS AND 6.30 EVENSONG.THE HOLY COMMUNION REPRESENTS THAT JESUS DIED FOR US.THE BREAD REPRESENTS THE BODY AND THE WINE REPRESENTS THE BLOOD. {THE METHODIST CHURCH . SUNDAY SERVICES 11AM 6.30PM SUNDAY SCHOOL 11AM.TODAY IS 3,7,85.
